farmingPlaces.description: A large-scale coffee plantation that follows sustainable farming practices, producing high-quality Arabica coffee.

farmingPlaces.description: An integrated aquaculture facility that combines fish farming with crop production for sustainable agriculture.

farmingPlaces.description: A high-altitude tea plantation known for producing some of the best organic teas in Africa.

farmingPlaces.description: A premium vanilla farm in the Rwenzori region, producing high-quality vanilla for export.

farmingPlaces.description: A thriving avocado farm specializing in Hass avocados for international markets.

farmingPlaces.description: A world-famous spice farm offering tours and organic spice production.
